Uses of Interface
org.codehaus.preon.buffer.BitBuffer

Packages that use BitBuffer
org.codehaus.preon The package providing the API allowing you to construct your own Codecs, and to extend the way Codecs are constructed. 
org.codehaus.preon.binding The package providing the interface as well as some default implementations of objects responsible for mediating between Codecs and Fields. 
org.codehaus.preon.buffer The package providing the abstractions for dealing with data encoded in sequences of bits. 
org.codehaus.preon.codec The package providing some default CodecFactories, supporting a number of different Codecs. 
org.codehaus.preon.emitter   
org.codehaus.preon.sample.varlength   
org.codehaus.preon.util The package providing some utility classes, supporting the construction of Codecs.
